org.jlab.cnuphys.histogram

Class Parameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.cnuphys.histogram.Parameter

  • public class Parameter
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines methods for creating and modifying a parameter object with a value, name, error, and min and max values.
    Version:
    061914
    Author:
    Erin Kirby

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Parameter()
      Creates a default Parameter object with the name "p0," a value of zero, a min value of -1.0e-10 and a max value of 1.0e-10, and no error value.
      Parameter(java.lang.String name, double value)
      Creates a Parameter object with the specified value and name.
      Parameter(java.lang.String name, double value, double min, double max)
      Initializes a Parameter object with the specified parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Parameter

        public Parameter()
        Creates a default Parameter object with the name "p0," a value of zero, a min value of -1.0e-10 and a max value of 1.0e-10, and no error value.

      • Parameter

        public Parameter(java.lang.String name,
         double value)
        Creates a Parameter object with the specified value and name. Initializes the min and max values to -1.0e-10 and 1.0e-10, respectively. It also initializes the error value to 0.0.
        Parameters:
        name - The desired name of the Parameter object
        value - The desired value of the Parameter object

      • Parameter

        public Parameter(java.lang.String name,
         double value,
         double min,
         double max)
        Initializes a Parameter object with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - The desired name of the Parameter
        value - The desired value of the Parameter
        min - The min value of the Parameter
        max - The max value of the Parameter
